name: Factory of Flesh
description:
Best Played in FullScreen

Welcome human! 

We are on a mission to restore civilization with the help of clean energy! 

Please help us in our mission!

Controls: 

Left click while on top of an organ:                       Select the organ

Hold left click and drag:                                               Move around the organ

Let go of left click while holding organ:              Place organ

Space:                                                                                     Go to next line of dialogue

Mouse hover:                                                                     Hover mouse over containers to see specific organ info

Credits:

Game design and Concepts: John Lundström and Ronny Phan

Lead artist: Ronny Phan

Artists: Johanna Carlsson, Ronny Phan and Yasmine Lindbeger

Programming: John Lundström

Sounds: All sound effects taken from gamesounds.xyz and edited by John Lundström

Johanna Carlsson: https://www.artstation.com/blueivory

John Lundström: https://itch.io/profile/sir-jonicles 

Ronny  Phan: https://www.artstation.com/ronnyphan1 | https://ronnyp.itch.io/

Yasmine Lindberger: https://www.artstation.com/sp00kydraws | https://www.instagram.com/sp00kydraws/

Changes from user feedback:

Unclear which organs were active so added a small texture that displays a checkmark if active and a cross if inactive
